name: OnePlus Nord CE5 | Massive 7100mAh Battery | MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Apex | Powered by OnePlus AI | 8GB + 128GB | Black Infinity

full_description: From the manufacturer Previous page Next page Previous page Next page Previous page Next page Previous page Next page Previous page Next page
feature_bullets: Flagship-class Performance with MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Apex: Benchmark-breaking 1.47 million+ AnTuTu score and up to 12GB of LPDDR5X RAM deliver ultra-smooth multitasking and snappy app responsiveness.

7100mAh - OnePlus‚Äôs Biggest Battery Ever with Bypass Charging: Up to 2.5 days of everyday use on a single charge ‚Äì more streaming, scrolling, and gaming without interruption. Say goodbye to battery anxiety. Just 10 minutes of charging gives you 6+ hours of YouTube. And Bypass Charging powers the phone directly to reduce battery stress and extend gaming sessions.
Dominate BGMI and CODM at up to 120 FPS: Ultra-fluid, lag-free gaming with high touch response rates gives you that split-second edge in every battle.

50MP Sony Main Camera with OIS: Shoot stunning 4K 60 FPS videos for Reels or Shorts and vibrant stills with OnePlus's flagship RAW HDR algorithm. Vivid colors and natural skin tones mean every selfie and groufie looks crisp, clear and true to life.
Dream Screen: 6.77‚Äù 120Hz AMOLED Display with Ultra HDR. Aqua Touch lets you confidently swipe even with wet or oily fingers.

Enhance Photos with AI: Instantly turn good photos great and make your photo gallery Instagram-ready. With AI Best Face (fixes blinks/blurs), AI Eraser (removes photobombers), AI Detail Boost (for crisper shots), and more.

Work Smarter with AI: Spend less time organizing and more time doing. With AI Mind Space (your searchable knowledge vault), AI Voice Scribe (instantly transcribes meetings/YouTube ), AI Call Assistant (translates/summarizes calls), and more.

'Faster than 5G' Internet Speeds: With 5G-Advanced, the Nord 5 delivers up to 3 times the 5G data speeds. It conquers high-congestion zones like packed stadiums, concerts, crowded caf√© environments effortlessly, allowing fast internet even with just 2 signal bars.

Fast and Built to Last with Expandable Sotrage and Memory: Nord CE5 ships with the latest (and smoothest) OxygenOS 15, promising 4 Android version upgrades plus 6 years of security updates. Our 6-year system smoothness guarantee and 4-year healthy battery promise keep your phone fast and smooth for years. Add up to 1TB extra storage via MicroSD - perfect for storing all your photos, videos, and apps. Plus, virtually expand RAM up to 12GB.

customers_say.summary: Customers find this phone to be a superb device with excellent battery life of 7100mAh that lasts more than two days, and they consider it the best value for money in its price range. The phone performs well with no lag or shuttering issues, and customers appreciate its display quality, with one noting how photos look more realistic. The sound quality receives mixed reviews, with some finding it good while others mention issues with the mono speaker.

reviews.title:
5.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Powerful Device and Brilliant Performance
reviews.review:
Using it for a while now! This Device is powerloaded with amazing performance in this segment and Oneplus AI is really good. One thing I've noticed that the phone has some heating issues but that doesn't last so long. Massive Battery underlies all the weakness alongwith with powerful performance. Camera is okayish and could've be better but again you're not buying a Dslr , Keep that in Mind! Also the screen touch is buttery and looking good. The speakers aren't that bad at all.

reviews.title:
5.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    This device is a jack of all trades.üí•üëç
reviews.review:
I ordered this phone on 17 july and got it on 18 july it was good and fair for its money,using it for the first time made it heat too much but that's not an issue, after sometime it was good the camera quality was good and the video recording was fair and gaming is excellent for a well balanced phone.Many reviewers are complaining about the speakers being a single channel.Yes the speakers maybe a little poor but the sound is loud and the quality is ok and it's missing the haptics and the battery is also good enough.The another important thing is the UI that it is a combination of both one plus and iOS. The dynamic island copy on this phone is pretty good and the flexibility of Android makes this a phone best of both UI's and the AI features such as erasing background image optimising it works fine around 8 times out of 10.If anyone Is looking for alternatives of samsung in under 25k range i recommend this phone for its quality and please don't compare this to another products because it's a kind of its own
  
Read more

reviews.title:
4.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Highly recommended for those looking for a reliable and affordable smartphone!
reviews.review:
OnePlus Nord CE! This phone has been a great addition to my daily life. The performance is smooth, camera quality is good, and the design is sleek. Battery life is good too. Overall, it's a solid mid-range device that ticks most of the right boxes. Highly recommended for those looking for a reliable and affordable smartphone!

reviews.title:
3.0 out of 5 stars







  
  
    Things that no one will tell you.
reviews.review:
Writing review after using it:Well, if you are not a big Oneplus fan, avoid it. At this price, you have better options. Why?1. The so called "big battery" survives a day with moderate use. Don't expect much if you are a heavy user.2. Both the camera performs like a 10k phone in low light. Daylight photos are okay. In daylight expect the same picture quality as any Samsung's 15k device.3. If you want one reason not to buy, it is the speaker. No dual speaker, the quality of existing speaker is not good enough. At high volume, the audio quality drops significantly.4. Fingerprint scanner: If you have the extra one sec, it's okay.Anything good?- Sleek Design.- Oxygen OS- Resell value üòÑ
